card.name: Bound By Rage
card.property: Plays to your support area. When you play this condition, you may spot 2 [Dunland] Men to place 2 [Dunland] tokens here. Response: If a [Dunland] Man is about to take a wound, discard this condition or remove a [Dunland] token from here to prevent that wound.

card.name: Dunlending Elder
card.property: While you control 2 sites, this minion is strength +5, fierce and damage +1.
Hatred of the Rohirrim is passed from generation to generation.

card.name: Dunlending Footmen
card.property: The twilight cost of this minion during a skirmish phase is -2.
Driven by Saruman's ranting, waves of Dunlendings descended upon the holdings of Rohan.

card.name: Dunlending Headman
card.property: When you play this minion, you may spot 2 other [Dunland] Men to take control of a site. The Free Peoples player may discard 2 cards from hand to prevent this.
The diminished Rohirrim offered little resistance to the advancing Dunland horde.

card.name: Dunlending Reserve
card.property: The twilight cost of this minion during a skirmish phase is -2.
The relentless campaign of the hillmen drove citizens of the Westfold to the shelter of their capital.

card.name: Hill Clan
card.property: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may play a [Dunland] Man from hand. That Man is fierce and damage +2 until the regroup phase.
”'We will take their king.'”

card.name: Ready to Fall
card.property: Plays to your support area. Shadow: Spot 2 sites you control and remove (2) to play a [Dunland] Man from your discard pile.
”'Why do you lay these troubles on an already troubled mind?'”

card.name: Too Long Have These Peasants Stood
card.property: Response: If a [Dunland] Man wins a skirmish, discard all conditions.
The rabble of Dunland pillaged their way across the Mark.

card.name: Lend Us Your Aid
card.property: Maneuver: Exert Gimli twice to make him and each Elf companion strength +3 until the regroup phase.
“He hewed a two-handed stroke and laid the last Orc before his feet. 'Now my count passes Master Legolas again.'”

card.name: Suspended Palaces
card.property: Plays to your support area. When you play this condition, you may spot a Dwarf to place 2 [Dwarven] tokens here. Fellowship: Discard this condition or remove a [Dwarven] token from here to stack the top card of your draw deck on a [Dwarven] condition that has a card stacked on it.

card.name: Toss Me
card.property: While this card is stacked on a [Dwarven] condition, Gimli is strength +1. Fellowship: Place this card or another [Dwarven] card from hand on top of or beneath your draw deck.
”'Don't tell the Elf.'”

card.name: Agility
card.property: Plays to your support area. When you play this condition, you may spot an Elf to place 2 [Elven] tokens here. Skirmish: Discard this condition or remove an [Elven] token from here to make a minion skirmishing an Elf strength -1.
Elves rely upon more than strength in combat.

card.name: Arwen
card.property: Skirmish: Exert an Elf to make a minion skirmishing Arwen strength -1.
”'If you trust nothing else, trust this… trust us.'”

card.name: Banner of Elbereth
card.property: Bearer must be an Elf companion. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may draw a card. Response: If bearer wins a skirmish, discard this possession to liberate a site.
”'First name the four, the free peoples: / Eldest of all, the elf-children…'”

card.name: Elrond
card.property: At the start of each turn, heal Elrond. Fellowship: Exert Elrond to discard the top card of your draw deck. If it is an [Elven] card, you may take it into hand and heal an Elf companion.
”'You have foreseen it. War is coming… many will die.'”

card.name: Forearmed
card.property: Skirmish: Reveal the top card of your draw deck to make a minion skirmishing an Elf strength -X, where X is the twilight cost of the revealed card.
”'Give them a volley.'”

card.name: Forewarned
card.property: To play, spot 2 Elves. Plays to your support area. Fellowship: Add (1) to look at the top card of your draw deck. You may discard this condition to discard that card.
”'Whether by the sword or the slow decay of time, Aragorn will die.'”

card.name: Galadriel
card.property: At the start of each turn, heal Galadriel. Skirmish: Exert Galadriel to discard the top card of your draw deck. If it is a Shadow card, make a minion skirmishing an Elf strength -3.
”Mortal Men.'”

card.name: Gift of Foresight
card.property: Fellowship: Spot an Elf to reveal the top card of your draw deck. You may discard it, return it to the top of your draw deck, or take it into hand.
”'Here you will dwell, bound to your grief, under the fading trees.'”

card.name: Must Be a Dream
card.property: Fellowship: Spot an Elf to reveal the top card of your draw deck. Heal up to 2 companions whose culture matches the revealed card. You may discard the revealed card.
”'May the Grace of the Valar protect you.'”

card.name: Naith Longbow
card.property: Bearer must be an Elf companion. Archery: Exert bearer to discard the top card of your draw deck. If it is an [Elven] card, exert a minion.
”'Show them no mercy, for you shall receive none.'”

card.name: Naith Troop
card.property: To play, spot 3 Elf companions. Skirmish: Exert Naith Troop to discard the top card of your draw deck. If it is an [Elven] card, make a minion skirmishing Naith Troop strength -2.
Now only the bow and the sword can forestall the coming of the Shadow.

card.name: Naith Warband
card.property: To play, spot 3 Elf companions. While Naith Warband bears a ranged weapon, it takes no more than 1 wound during each skirmish phase and does not add to the fellowship archery total.
”'But do not think that only by singing amid the trees…….'”

card.name: Boomed and Trumpeted
card.property: Skirmish: Make an Ent strength +X and damage +X, where X is the number of unbound Hobbits you can spot.
”'For bole and bough are burning now, the furnace roars-we go to war!'”

card.name: Crack Into Rubble
card.property: Regroup: Exert 2 Ents to liberate a site and discard a Shadow condition.
”'To Isengard! Though Isengard be ringed and barred with doors of stone; / Though Isengard be strong and hard, as cold as stone and bare as bone….'''

card.name: Enraged
card.property: Bearer must be an Ent. Limit 1 per bearer. Discard this condition at the end of the turn.
”'An angry Ent is terrifying.'”

card.name: Ent Avenger
card.property: While you can spot 3 Ents, this companion is strength +2.
“As they drew near the flash and flicker of their eyes could be seen.”

card.name: Ent Horde
card.property: To play, spot 2 Ent companions. Ent Horde's twilight cost is -2 for each Ent or unbound Hobbit you can spot. While you can spot more minions than companions, Ent Horde is defender +1.
”'With doom we come, with doom we come!'”

card.name: Ent Moot
card.property: To play, exert an unbound Hobbit. Bearer must be an Ent. Limit 1 per bearer.
“But when the Ents all gathered round Treebeard,… then the Hobbits saw that they were all of the same kindred, and all had the same eyes….”

card.name: Gandalf
card.property: Damage +1. Each time the fellowship moves, wound Gandalf.
”'The Dark Lord has Nine. But we have One, mightier than they: the White Rider. He has passed through the fire and the abyss, and they shall fear him.'”

card.name: Glamdring
card.property: Bearer must be Gandalf. He is damage +1. Each time you play a spell during a skirmish, you may make Gandalf damage +1 until the end of that skirmish.
”'Thunder they heard, and lightning… smote upon Celebdil, and leaped back broken into tongues of fire.'”

card.name: Host of Fangorn
card.property: To play, spot 2 Ent companions. Host of Fangorn's twilight cost is -2 for each Ent or unbound Hobbit you can spot.
”'Of course, it is likely enough, my friends…that we are going to our doom, the last march of the Ents.'”

card.name: Quickbeam
card.property: Quickbeam's twilight cost is -1 for each Ent and unbound Hobbit you can spot.
”'But if we stayed home and did nothing, doom would find us anyway, sooner or later.'”

card.name: Roused
card.property: Skirmish: Exert an Ent to make him strength +1 for each Ent you spot (limit +4).
”'To Isengard!' the Ents cried in many voices.”

card.name: Skinbark
card.property: Skinbark's twilight cost is -1 for each Ent or unbound Hobbit you can spot. Response: If an unbound Hobbit is about to take a wound, exert Skinbark to prevent that wound.
”'He was wounded by Orcs, and many of his folk and tree-herds have been murdered and destroyed.'”

card.name: Threw Down My Enemy
card.property: Spell. Skirmish: Make a minion skirmishing Gandalf strength -1 for each wound on each character in the skirmish.
”'…he fell from the high place and broke the mountain-side where he smote it in his ruin.'”

card.name: Treebeard
card.property: Unhasty. Assignment: Exert an unbound Hobbit to allow Treebeard to skirmish. Skirmish: Exert Treebeard to make an Ent damage +1.
”'The little that I know of his long slow story would make a tale for which we have no time now.'”

card.name: Don't Follow the Lights
card.property: Response: If Smeagol wins a skirmish, add a burden to discard a minion.
”'Careful, careful now or Hobbits go down to join the dead ones and light little candles.'”

card.name: Don't Look at Them
card.property: Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Spot Smeagol and discard 3 cards from hand to wound a minion Smeagol is skirmishing once (or twice if that minion is a [Wraith] minion).
”'You should not look in when the candles are lit.'”

card.name: Gollum
card.property: Skirmish: Discard a card from hand to make Gollum strength +1 (or +2 if skirmishing a Ring-Bound companion).
”'Must take it. The Wraiths are searching. Must take it.'”

card.name: Master Broke His Promise
card.property: Regroup: Exert Gollum 3 times to wound each companion. The move limit for this turn is -1.
”'Kill them! Kill them! Kill them both! And then we take the Precious! We be the Master!'”

card.name: Nasty
card.property: Response: If Gollum wins a skirmish, add a burden.
”'We ought to wring their filthy little necks!'”

card.name: Not Listening
card.property: Response: If Smeagol wins a skirmish, heal him and remove 2 burdens.
”'They'll wake too quick and kill us… Not now. Not yet.'”

card.name: Safe Paths
card.property: Regroup: Exert Smeagol 3 times and discard him to wound each minion. The move limit for this turn is +1. If the fellowship moves, each Shadow player may take up to 3 Shadow cards into hand from his or her discard pile.
”'Soft and quick as shadows we must be!'”

card.name: Smeagol
card.property: Ring-bound. To play, add a burden. Skirmish: Discard a card from hand to make Smeagol strength +1.
”'And we're so lonely… We'll be nice to them, very nice, if they'll be nice to us, won't we, yes, yess.'”

card.name: They Stole It
card.property: Plays to your support arear Skirmish: Spot Gollum and discard 3 cards from hand to wound a companion Gollum is skirmishing once (or twice if that companion is a [Shire] companion).
”'Where iss it, where iss it: my precious….'”

card.name: You're a Liar and a Thief
card.property: Response: If Gollum wins a skirmish, wound a companion (except the Ring-bearer).
”'No, sweet one. See, my precious: if we has it, then we can escape, even from Him, eh?'”

card.name: Anborn
card.property: Ring-bound. Ranger. Each time Anborn wins a skirmish, you may make a minion's site number +3 until the regroup phase.
”'Perhaps under the shadow of the Unnamed some of the beasts of Mirkwood are wandering hither to our woods.'”

card.name: Ancient Roads
card.property: Plays to your support area. While you can spot 3 rangers, the site number of each minion skirmishing a ranger is +2.
”'…they go ever more heedlessly, we learn, thinking that the power of their new master is great enough….'”

card.name: Aragorn
card.property: Skirmish: Remove an [Elven] token to make a minion skirmishing Aragorn strength -3. Skirmish: Remove a [Dwarven] token to heal a Dwarf. Regroup: If Aragorn is mounted, remove a [Rohan] token to wound a minion twice.
”'…this is the hour when we draw swords together.'”

card.name: Banner of Westernesse
card.property: Bearer must be a [Gondor] companion. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may heal another [Gondor] companion. Response: If bearer wins a skirmish, discard this possession to liberate a site.
”'What brought they from the foundered land / Over the flowing sea?… / and one white tree.'”

card.name: Garrison of Osgiliath
card.property: Fortification. Plays to your support area. When you play this condition, you may spot a [Gondor] Man to place 2 [Gondor] tokens here. Skirmish: Discard this condition or remove a [Gondor] token from here to make a [Gondor] Man strength +1.
”'So ever do we watch the shores nigh Osgiliath….'”

card.name: Mortal Men
card.property: Skirmish: Make a [Gondor] Man strength +2 (and exert a minion if you spot a [Rohan] token).
”'I fear neither death nor pain.'”

card.name: Perilous Ventures
card.property: Regroup: Exert 2 rangers to discard a minion (or 2 [Wraith] minions).
”'But still we will not sit idle and let Him do all as He would….'”

card.name: Ring of Barahir
card.property: Bearer must be Aragorn. At the start of each of your turns, you may spot a culture token to heal a companion of that culture.
”'This is a thing of worth beyond your reckoning. For its ancientry alone. It has no power, save the esteem in which those hold it who love my house.'”

card.name: Trust
card.property: Skirmish: Make a [Gondor] Man strength +2 (and heal a companion if you spot an [Elven] token).
”'You cannot falter now.'”

card.name: Agents of Orthanc
card.property: This minion is strength +2 and damage +1 for each Free Peoples culture that you can spot over 2.
”'How long is it since Saruman bought you?'”

card.name: Assault Ladder
card.property: Machine. Plays to your support area. Shadow: Exert an Uruk-hai to place an [Isengard] token on this card. Skirmish: Spot 3 [Isengard] tokens here to make an Uruk-hai strength +3. Discard this condition.
”'It is a great host….'”

card.name: Banner of Isengard
card.property: Bearer must be an [Isengard] minion. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, the Free Peoples player must exert a companion for each site you control.
”…blazoned upon every helm and shield the ghastly hand of Isengard was seen.”

card.name: Berserk Butcher
card.property: Damage +1. Berserk Butcher is strength +1 for each wound on each character in its skirmish. Maneuver: Remove an [Isengard] token from a machine and exert Berserk Butcher twice to prevent all wounds to Uruk-hai until the assignment phase.

card.name: Desertion
card.property: To play, spot an [Isengard] Man. Plays on a companion (except the Ring-bearer). Assignment: Assign an [Isengard] minion with less strength than bearer to skirmish bearer. Discard this condition.
”'Who knows what you've spoken to the darkness in the bitter watches of the night?'”

card.name: Fires and Foul Fumes
card.property: Regroup: Discard 4 [Isengard] orcs to wound a companion 4 times (except the Ring-bearer).
”'One of them… got caught in a spray of some liquid fire and burned like a torch: a horrible sight.'”

card.name: Gnawing, Biting, Hacking, Burning!
card.property: Plays to your support area. Each time a regroup action discards an [Isengard] Orc, you may stack that Orc on this card. Shadow: Discard 2 cards stacked here and remove (1) to play an [Isengard] Orc from your discard pile.
”'Destroyers and usurpers.'”

card.name: Iron Fist of the Orc
card.property: Plays to your support area. Each time a regroup action discards an [Isengard] Orc, you may stack that Orc on this card. Regroup: Discard 3 cards stacked here and remove (1) to discard a Free Peoples possession.
”'The old world will burn in the fires of industry.'”

card.name: Isengard Artisan
card.property: Regroup: Discard an [Isengard] Orc to make the Free Peoples player wound a companion.
Minions of Orthanc shared their master's fascination with machines.

card.name: Isengard Builder
card.property: Regroup: If stacked on an [Isengard] card, discard this card to add (2).
”'They were all singing with harsh voices, and laughing, making a hideous din.'”

card.name: Isengard Journeyman
card.property: Regroup: Discard an [Isengard] Orc to make the Free Peoples player wound a companion.
Drudgery and toil at Isengard left Saruman's minions hungry for sport.

card.name: Isengard Mechanics
card.property: Regroup: Discard an [Isengard] Orc to make the Free Peoples player wound a companion (or 2 companions if you spot 6 companions). Regroup: If this minion is stacked on an [Isengard] card, spot an [Isengard] Orc and discard this minion to add (3).

card.name: Isengard Plodder
card.property: Regroup: Discard an [Isengard] Orc to make the Free Peoples player wound a companion.
Saruman dispatched his trusted Orcs to aid in the sack of Rohan.

card.name: Isengard Tender
card.property: Regroup: If stacked on an [Isengard] card, discard this card and remove (2) to exhaust a companion.
Unfortunate Orcs assisted in Saruman's foul wizardry.

card.name: Isengard Tinker
card.property: Regroup: Discard an [Isengard] Orc to make the Free Peoples player wound a companion.
”'I wonder if his fame was… due to his cleverness in settling at Isengard.'”

card.name: Rohirrim Traitor
card.property: While you can spot a companion bearing an [Isengard] condition, this minion is strength +2.
”'Once it was a man, and did you service in its fashion.'”

card.name: Scaffolding
card.property: Plays to your support area. Each time a regroup action discards an [Isengard] Orc, you may stack that Orc on this card. Response: If an [Isengard] Orc is about to take a wound, discard 2 cards stacked here to prevent that wound.
Towers marked the inner ring, implements of industry.

card.name: Sharku
card.property: Warg-rider. While Sharku is not exhausted, he is fierce. Regroup: Exert Sharku to add (1).
”'Send out your warg-riders.'”

card.name: Twisted Tales
card.property: Plays to your support area. Each time a companion or ally loses a skirmish involving a [Isengard] Man, you may spot a possession to stack that possession here.
”'Too long have you sat in the shadows….'”

card.name: The Balrog
card.property: Damage +2. The twilight cost of The Balrog is -3 if you can spot a [Moria] minion. The Balrog cannot be assigned to skirmish companions or allies of strength less than 6.
”'…he burst into new flame.'”

card.name: Durin's Tower
card.property: Plays to your support area. At sites 2T and 3T, The Balrog's twilight cost is -3. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a unique [Moria] minion strength +3.
”'…carved in the living rock of Zirakzigil, the pinnacle of the Silvertine.'”

card.name: Easterling Army
card.property: Easterling. Fierce. Skirmish: Spot 2 burdens and exert this minion to make an Easterling strength +1. Skirmish: Spot 4 burdens and exert this minion to make an Easterling strength +2. Skirmish: Spot 6 burdens and exert this minion to make an Easterling strength +3.

card.name: Easterling Polearm
card.property: Bearer must be an Easterling. While you can spot 2 burdens, bearer cannot take wounds. While you can spot 5 burdens, bearer is damage +1.
”'…and the tips of their spears….'”

card.name: Southron Archer Legion
card.property: Southron. Archer. Archery: Remove (3) to add 1 to the minion archery total for each companion over 4 (limit +4).
”'But I've heard tales of the big folk down away in the Sunlands.'”

card.name: Southron Invaders
card.property: Southron. Ambush (1). When you play this minion, you may spot another Southron to play a minion with ambush from your discard pile.
”'So when you said “Men out of the South, all in red and gold,” I said “were there any oliphaunts?” For if there was, I was going to take a look….'”

card.name: Trample
card.property: Maneuver: Spot a mounted [Raider] Man to discard a companion (except the Ring-bearer). The Free Peoples player may add (4) to prevent this.
”'…I stomp round and round, / Never lie on the ground, / Not even to die. / Oliphaunt am I….'”

card.name: Fell Beast
card.property: To play, discard 2 cards from hand. Bearer must be a Nazgul. Bearer is fierce.
”'And these winged creatures that they ride on now, they can probably see more than any other creature. They are like great carrion birds.'”

card.name: Spied From Above
card.property: Plays to your support area. Regroup: Exert a Nazgul twice to play a [Wraith] or [Sauron] minion. That minion's twilight cost is -8 and it comes into play exhausted.
“It leaped into all of their minds that the Black Wings had spied them and had sent armed soldiers to seize them….”

card.name: Sword of Dol Guldur
card.property: Bearer must be a Nazgul. While bearer is Ulaire Toldea, each time he wins a skirmish the Free Peoples player must discard a Free Peoples possession or a Free Peoples condition.
The weapons of the Nine are wrought with sorcery.

card.name: Ulaire Lemenya
card.property: Regroup: Exert Ulaire Lemenya and discard 3 cards from hand to return a companion (except the Ring-bearer) to owner's hand.
”…the helpless horror that had come with the cry in the wind and the shadow on the moon….”

card.name: Ulaire Nertea
card.property: When you play Ulaire Nertea, spot another Nazgul to make the Free Peoples player exert a Ring-bound companion for each Free Peoples culture you can spot over 2.
“A vast winged shape passed over the moon like a black cloud… The stars fainted before it….”

card.name: Ulaire Toldea
card.property: Fierce. Each time Ulaire Toldea wins a skirmish, the Free Peoples player must exert a companion or add a burden.
”'They are calling for it. Calling for the precious.'”

card.name: Ulaire Toldea
card.property: Fierce. Each time Ulaire Toldea wins a skirmish, the Free Peoples player must exert a companion or add a burden.
”'They are calling for it. Calling for the precious.'”

card.name: Winged and Ominous
card.property: Plays to your support area. Regroup: Exert a Nazgul to place a [Wraith] token on this card. Shadow: Remove 3 [Wraith] tokens from here to add (2).
“It scudded across the moon… outrunning the wind in its fell speed.”

card.name: Banner of the Mark
card.property: Bearer must be a [Rohan] companion. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may exert a minion. Response: If bearer wins a skirmish, discard this possession to liberate a site.
”'Fell deeds awake. Now for wrath. Now for ruin, and the red dawn.'”

card.name: Blood Has Been Spilled
card.property: Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Discard a mount borne by a [Rohan] Man to prevent that Man from being overwhelmed unless his or her strength is tripled.
“They were hemming the Orcs in, preventing them from scattering, and driving them….”

card.name: Eomer
card.property: Valiant. While you can spot a [Rohan] Man, Eomer's twilight cost is -1. Skirmish: Discard 3 cards from hand to make a [Rohan] Man strength +2 for each wound on each minion in his or her skirmish.
”for the Mark!'”

card.name: Ever the Hope of Men
card.property: Regroup: Exert 2 mounted [Rohan] Men to discard up to 2 wounded minions.
”'Would that day was here and we might ride down upon them like a storm out of the mountains!'”

card.name: Hama
card.property: To play, spot a [Rohan] Man. Skirmish: Exert Hama to discard a possession borne by a minion he is skirmishing.
”'Yet in doubt a man of worth will trust to his own wisdom. I believe you are friends and folk worthy of honour, who have no evil purpose.'”

card.name: Hrethel
card.property: To play, spot a [Rohan] Man. Skirmish: Heal a minion skirmishing Hrethel to make Hrethel strength +3 (limit +3).
”…gaining on the Orcs, gaining on them like a tide over the flats on folk straying in a quicksand.”

card.name: News From the Mark
card.property: Fellowship: Spot 3 mounted [Rohan] Men to make the move limit for this turn +2. Each Shadow player may draw 6 cards.

card.name: We Left None Alive
card.property: Plays to your support area. When you play this condition, you may spot a [Rohan] Man to place 2 [Rohan] tokens here. Skirmish: Discard this condition or remove a [Rohan] token from here to make a [Rohan] Man skirmishing an exhausted minion strength +2.

card.name: Banner of the Eye
card.property: Bearer must be an [Sauron] Orc. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may add (1) for each site you control.
“Stony-faced they were, with dark window- holes staring north and east and west, and each window was full of sleepless eyes.”

card.name: Corpse Lights
card.property: Twilight. Skirmish: Exert this minion to make a [Sauron] or twilight minion strength +1 for each twilight minion you can spot.
”'I tried once; but you cannot reach them. Only shapes to see, perhaps, not to touch.'”

card.name: Dead Ones
card.property: Twilight. Damage +1. To play this minion, remove a burden or spot a twilight minion.
”'The Dead can't really be there! Is it some devilry hatched in the Dark Land?'”

card.name: Gate Picket
card.property: Maneuver: Exert this minion twice to make the Free Peoples player name 3 cultures. Wound each companion and ally not of a named culture.
“Now the watch-towers, which had fallen into decay, were repaired, and filled with arms, and garrisoned with ceaseless vigilance.”

card.name: Gate Sentry
card.property: Maneuver: Exert this minion twice and spot another [Sauron] minion to discard a condition.
“In it there was a single gate of iron, and upon its battlement sentinels paced unceasingly.”

card.name: Gate Troll
card.property: Fierce. While you can spot a Troll, Gate Troll's twilight cost is -4. For each other [Sauron] minion you can spot, this minion is strength +1.
“This was Cirith Gorgor, the Haunted Pass, the entrance to the land of the Enemy.”

card.name: Orc Insurgent
card.property: Shadow: Exert this minion to draw X cards and add (X), where X is the number of Free Peoples cultures you spot over 2.

card.name: Peril
card.property: Plays to your support area. Regroup: Exert a [Sauron] Orc to play a Nazgul or [Sauron] minion. Its twilight cost is -4 and it comes into play exhausted.

card.name: Troll of Udun
card.property: Fierce. While you can spot a Troll, this minion's twilight cost is -4. Skirmish: Discard a [Sauron] card from hand to make this minion strength +1.
”'…Trolls are only counterfeits, made by the Enemy in the Great Darkness, in mockery of Ents….'”

card.name: Troll's Chain
card.property: Bearer must be a [Sauron] Troll. When you play this possession, you may draw a card.
“Trolls they were, but filled with the evil will of their master.”

card.name: Wisp of Pale Sheen
card.property: Twilight. Regroup: Spot another [Sauron] or twilight minion and discard this minion to add a burden.
”'They do not see what lies ahead / When Sun has failed and Moon is dead.'”

card.name: Held
card.property: Bearer must be Frodo. Each time Frodo is about to be killed by a wound, add a burden instead. When the fellowship moves to site 9, Frodo is corrupted. Regroup: If you can spot no minions, discard this condition.

card.name: It Burns Us
card.property: Regroup: Spot Sam and Smeagol (or Gollum) to choose an opponent who must reveal his or her hand. Wound a minion X times, where X is the number of different cultures revealed.
”'No more than you deserve.'”

card.name: Kept Safe
card.property: Plays to your support area. When you play this condition, place 2 [Shire] tokens here. Response: If an unbound Hobbit is about to take a wound, discard this condition or remove a [Shire] token from here to prevent that wound.

card.name: Long Slow Wrath
card.property: Skirmish: Exert an unbound Hobbit to make him strength +1 and damage +1 for each [Gandalf] companion you can spot.
”'The coming of the hobbits and the tidings that they brought have spilled it: it will soon be running like a flood….'”

card.name: Merry
card.property: Regroup: Discard Merry to heal a [Gandalf] companion.
”'Don't talk to it Merry. Don't encourage it.'”

card.name: Pippin
card.property: Regroup: Discard Pippin to choose a Shadow player who must wound one of his or her minions.
”'By root and twig, but this is a strange business: up sprout a little folk that are not in the old lists….'”

card.name: Rocks of Emyn Muil
card.property: Fellowship: Play a companion with the Frodo signet to remove a burden.

card.name: Westfold
card.property: Fellowship: Exert Aragorn twice to play a companion with the Aragorn signet from your draw deck.

card.name: Meduseld
card.property: Sanctuary. Fellowship: Exert 3 companions with the Gandalf signet to play an unbound companion from your dead pile.

card.name: Hornburg Hall
card.property: Sanctuary. Fellowship: Spot 3 companions with the Theoden signet and discard your hand to draw 4 cards.

card.name: Valley of Saruman
card.property: When the fellowship moves to this site, discard all allies.

card.name: Saruman's Laboratory
card.property: Response: If your minion is about to take a wound, discard 2 cards from hand to prevent that wound.

card.name: Faramir
card.property: Ring-bound. Ranger. If Faramir is in your starting fellowship, his twilight cost is -1. Fellowship: Play a ranger to heal a Ring-bound companion.
”'Not while Faramir is Captain… his life is charmed, or fate spares him for some other end.'”

card.name: The Witch-king
card.property: Fierce. Each time a companion is killed in a skirmish involving a Nazgul, wound an ally twice or exert a companion.
”'Dead? No, you cannot kill them.'”

card.name: Enraged
card.property: Bearer must be an Ent. Limit 1 per bearer. Discard this condition at the end of the turn.

card.name: Skinbark
card.property: Skinbark's twilight cost is -1 for each Ent or unbound Hobbit you can spot. Response: If an unbound Hobbit is about to take a wound, exert Skinbark to prevent that wound.

card.name: Don't Look at Them
card.property: Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Spot Smeagol and discard 3 cards from hand to wound a minion Smeagol is skirmishing once (or twice if that minion is a [Wraith] minion).

card.name: Ancient Roads
card.property: Plays to your support area. While you can spot 3 rangers, the site number of each minion skirmishing a ranger is +2.

card.name: Isengard Mechanics
card.property: Regroup: Discard an [Isengard] Orc to make the Free Peoples player wound a companion (or 2 companions if you spot 6 companions). Regroup: If this minion is stacked on an [Isengard] card, spot an [Isengard] Orc and discard this minion to add (3).

card.name: Gate Troll
card.property: Fierce. While you can spot a Troll, Gate Troll's twilight cost is -4. For each other [Sauron] minion you can spot, this minion is strength +1.

card.name: Treebeard
card.property: Unhasty. Assignment: Exert an unbound Hobbit to allow Treebeard to skirmish. Skirmish: Exert Treebeard to make an Ent damage +1.

card.name: Aragorn
card.property: Skirmish: Remove an [Elven] token to make a minion skirmishing Aragorn strength -3. Skirmish: Remove a [Dwarven] token to heal a Dwarf. Regroup: If Aragorn is mounted, remove a [Rohan] token to wound a minion twice.

card.name: Merry
card.property: Regroup: Discard Merry to heal a [Gandalf] companion.
